'''The Heart of Naberius''' is an artifact discovered by [[Albedo]] and his master, [[Rhinedottir]], deep in the heart of a dungeon. Shortly after discovering it, Rhinedottir disappeared, leaving behind a message for Albedo to uncover the "truth and meaning of this world."<ref>{{Ref/CS|Albedo|4}}</ref>

==Trivia==
* Naberius is suspected to be a [[god]], and possibly even a former [[archon]], based on the fact that this item's name is similar to the Chinese name for [[Gnoses]], {{zh|神之心|tl=Heart of God.}}

===Etymology===
* {{w|Naberius}} is a demon and Marquess of Hell mentioned in the {{w|The Lesser Key of Solomon#Ars Goetia|Ars Goetia}}, who takes the form of a three-headed dog or a raven. He is said to have a harsh voice.
